meanings.definition: The tendency to act on a whim without considering the consequences.
meanings.sent1: Her impulsivity often led her to make decisions without thinking them through.
meanings.sent2: His impulsivity in spending money without budgeting caused financial problems.
meanings.sent3: The impulsivity of buying a pet monkey online resulted in chaos at home.
meanings.sent4: His impulsivity in accepting every dare made him the daredevil of the group.
meanings.sent5: The impulsivity of jumping into the lake without checking the depth was risky.

meanings.sent1: The impulsivity decision to quit his job surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: She regretted her impulsivity purchase of the expensive dress.
meanings.sent3: His impulsivity choice of wearing mismatched socks made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The impulsivity move to change lanes without signaling caused a near accident.
meanings.sent5: The impulsivity behavior of blurting out secrets without thinking upset his friends.
